name: Elemental Butterfly
description:
Ever wanted to build a world, and the laws of nature, with ancient, elemental powers?—like air, earth, water, fire, light, and darkness?

What about building your world with a PowerPoint game?

  • Play a butterfly, sending ripples of decisions through time-space
  • Choose from 30 supernatural aids, eager to help you build
  • Discover 60 intelligences, including 30 humanoids + 30 animen

GAME JAM

The PowerPoint Game Jam March Edition's theme is "nature," so I decided to put the power of nature in the user's hands!—but I got a bit out of hand with the meaningful choices and decision trees, because this game packs over a hundred slides...

Fortunately, this prototype only takes a couple minutes to play! Try it a few times to see how many endings are available... And if you have an idea on what should come next in the world-building process, we'd love to hear about it. :)

Requires PowerPoint, Keynote, or Open Office.
